clang -fPIC  -g -shared -Wl,-soname,libengine.so -o libengine.so CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/containers/darray.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/core/application.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/core/clock.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/core/defines.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/core/events.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/core/input.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/core/kmemory.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/math/kmath.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/platform/platform.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/renderer/commandbuffer.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/renderer/device.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/renderer/fence.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/renderer/framebuffer.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/renderer/image.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/renderer/rendererbackend.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/renderer/rendererfrontend.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/renderer/renderpass.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/renderer/swapchain.c.o CMakeFiles/engine.dir/src/renderer/utils.c.o  /lib/libvulkan.so /usr/lib/libSM.so /usr/lib/libICE.so /usr/lib/libX11.so /usr/lib/libXext.so -lX11-xcb -lxcb
